name: PBwiki syntax highlighting
summary: Syntax highlighting and an ftplugin for PBwiki
description:
Syntax highlighting for PBwiki, http://pbwiki.com/. Also a filetype detection script which sets appropriate buffer-local options for editing long lines, etc.

Latest copy can be found at http://www.georgevreilly.com/vim/pbwiki/
install_details:
Create a HOME directory, if you haven't already
Create a "vimfiles" (Windows) or ".vim" (Unix/Mac) folder in your HOME directory.
Unzip pbwiki.zip in that vimfiles (.vim) folder.
Restart Vim

See ":help add-global-plugin" for more details

versions.release_notes: Converted DOS line endings to Unix format.
Clean-up. Better matching of PBwiki constructs. Removed stale Flexwiki matches that have no PBwiki equivalent.
Re-upload now that I know the script_id. Chicken, meet egg.
